text: The Liberal Left (, IL) was a political party led by Santiago Alba which split from the Liberal Party in 1917, after the crisis in the Romanones government. The party was disestablished in 1923 after Miguel Primo de Rivera's coup. ==References== Category:Liberal Party (Spain, 1880) Category:Defunct political parties in Spain Category:Political parties established in 1913 Category:Political parties disestablished in 1923 Category:1913 establishments in Spain Category:1923 disestablishments in Spain Category:Restoration (Spain)
title: Liberal Left (Spain)
